Welcome to Apache-vi¶

Apache-vi is an Apache log analyzer tool.

Table of Contents¶

Module documentation¶

Click here to access the module documentation: Apache-vi Modules

How to use¶

$ python3 ./main.py --input-file log_file --output-dir output_dir
